title: Heroin
creator_credit: Richard Scott, BFA Educational Media and Medi-Cine
brief_description: Deals with expectations of drug users, the addiction cycle, the goals, problems, successes and failures of substitutive programs such as methadone therapy. Emphasises through interviews the damaging effects of heroin use. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
